AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Set your AWS Access Key ID to enable S3 file storage. Leave blank to disable file uploads.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS Access Secret Key, if using S3 file storage.

AWS_DEFAULT_REGION.description: Region of your S3 bucket on AWS, if using S3 file storage.

GHOST_STORAGE_ADAPTER_S3_PATH_BUCKET.description: Name of your S3 bucket on AWS, if using S3 file storage.

GHOST_STORAGE_ADAPTER_S3_ASSET_HOST.description: Optional custom CDN asset host url, if using S3 file storage.

GHOST_STORAGE_ADAPTER_S3_PATH_PREFIX.description: Optional path prefix, if using S3 file storage.

GHOST_STORAGE_ADAPTER_S3_ENDPOINT.description: Optional endpoint url (only required for 3rd-party S3 providers), if using S3 file storage.
